https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/tj6v8SCbxHr6Zisas9luJqtPw9O.jpg A reclusive, God-fearing 91-year-old man and a young Cuban refugee home-aid worker struggle to come to terms with their regrets, the unbearable pain of unacceptable loss, love and the most difficult and beautiful of human truths: life ends and life goes on. Day of Days
